actions.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 281 (Roll no. 847).

description: Amendment sought to require that possession or carrying of a concealed loaded handgun in a State to be subject to that State's law regarding firearm safety training, including live-fire exercise.
purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-283 to require the possession or carrying of a concealed handgun in a state to be subject to that state's law regarding concealed carry in regards to firearm safety training that includes live-fire exercise.
